member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxHtmlEditor.ASPxHtmlEditorHtmlEditingSettings.AllowFormElements

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the editor's HTML markup can contain form elements, such as 'form', 'input', 'select', etc.

member.value: true if form elements are allowed within the editor's content; false if form elements are automatically removed from the editor's HTML markup.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxHtmlEditor.ASPxHtmlEditorHtmlEditingSettings.AllowIFrames

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the editor's HTML markup can contain iFrames.

member.value: true if iFrames are allowed within the editor's content; false if iFrames are automatically removed from the editor's HTML markup.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxHtmlEditor.ASPxHtmlEditorHtmlEditingSettings.AllowScripts

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the editor's HTML markup can contain scripts.

member.value: true if scripts are allowed within the editor's content; false if scripts are automatically removed from the editor's HTML markup.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxHtmlEditor.ASPxHtmlEditorHtmlEditingSettings.UpdateBoldItalic

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the b (bold) and i (italic) elements occurring within the editor's HTML markup should be replaced with the strong and em elements respectively.

member.value: true if the b and i elements should be replaced with the strong and em elements within the editor's HTML markup; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxHtmlEditor.ASPxHtmlEditorHtmlEditingSettings.UpdateDeprecatedElements

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether deprecated elements occurring within the editor's HTML markup should be replaced with their valid analogs.

member.value: true if deprecated elements should be replaced with their valid analogs within the editor's HTML markup; otherwise, false.
